title: We have the apartment you have been waiting for
posting_body: ['Villas on 76th, managed by BLDG Management', '2002 W. 76th Avenue', 'Denver, CO 80221', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', "Villas on 76th is centrally located in Denver, CO north of the Boulder Turnpike and close to the Colorado's many job centers; among them, Downtown Denver, Boulder, Interlocken and Flatirons.", 'We offer outstanding amenities including a newly renovated clubhouse available for the private use of our residents.', 'Community Amenities', '*Playground', '*On-Site Maintenance', '*Club House', '*Laundry Facilities', '*Pet Park', '*Picnic Areas with Grills', '*Sparkling Pool', '*TV Lounge', 'This remodeled two bedroom apartment has upgraded kitchen, bathroom and carpet.', 'Perfectly located off the Denver-Boulder Turnpike- our residents find convenience around every corner.', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'Units are available now, call for details!', 'Monday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Tuesday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Wednesday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Thursday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Friday 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 5:00pm']
